item.title: Trump ‘certainly’ can fire Fed chair Powell ‘if there’s cause’: Hassett
item.description: Top Trump administration officials have escalated their criticisms of Fed Chair Jerome Powell by targeting the Federal Reserve's renovation project.

item.title: Federal Reserve quietly responds to Trump administration attacks over renovation
item.description: The central bank is quietly pushing back with a new "Frequently Asked Questions" page on its website defending the central bank's renovation.

item.title: Trump's 30% tariff letter leaves EU scrambling to bring U.S. on side
item.description: European Union leaders have said they are still working towards reaching a negotiated solution with the U.S.

item.title: The EU is delaying retaliatory tariffs on U.S. goods in hopes of reaching a deal by Aug. 1
item.description: The EU will suspend retaliatory tariffs on U.S. goods scheduled to take effect Monday in hopes of reaching a trade deal with the Trump administration.

item.title: Trump interest in Russia sanctions raises Ukraine allies' hopes
item.description: Ukraine's supporters in Washington and Kyiv are anxiously awaiting what the Republican president has said will be a "major statement" on Russia on Mon...
